Name: Survive and Revenge
About the game: Survive and Revenge is an action and survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. There are different levels to explore and survive. Loot and Craft Resources are rare in the world and only by gathering and looting you can survive. Loot is needed to craft important items. Explore and Fight Fight with mutants and outlaws to discover remote places. Quests and story Follow the main story and decide for yourself which side quests you will complete. Base and cities Buy a base and have the base expanded. Settlements can be inhabited by good or bad people.
Meta Title: Survive and Revenge: Dec 6, 2022, HW72 and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Survive and Revenge? Check out the release date (Dec 6, 2022), developer insights from HW72, and a complete game summary.
